Events.RelatedDescription: Opened pull request "fix(weex): send createFinish signal after root component mounted" (#7154) at vuejs/vue
Events.RelatedBody:
**What kind of change does this PR introduce?**

- [x] Bugfix

**Does this PR introduce a breaking change?**

- [x] No

**Other information:**

Make sure the timing of sending the "createFinish" signal is more reasonable, even if using asynchronous rendering (Call `new Vue()` in Promise or timer).

Events.RelatedDescription: Opened issue "I hope that routing jumps can change the title of the page" (#1912) at vuejs/vue-router
Events.RelatedBody:
I have a problem that I want to set different title values for each routing interface, but routing does not support this feature.
Can I add a title attribute to each router object, so that I can change the title value of the page when I'm routing, so that I don't have to change the name of the route through document.title according to the route's name.
